welcome.title: Hello World
welcome.text: A Website without anything really important
welcome.subtext: Made by the AMAZING Esteban Launay
travels.title: Travels
travels.text: A quick view of my travels
travels.northfrance.title: North of France
travels.southfrance.title: South of France
travels.indonesia.title: Indonesia
travels.indonesia.text: End of an 1 year trip around Asia, Bali and Java
travels.malaysia.title: Malaysia
travels.malaysia.text: 1 month in malaysia with a week-end trip in Singapor
travels.thailand.title: Thailand
travels.thailand.text: 1 month in Thailand, from North to South with some island visit
travels.laos.title: Laos
travels.laos.text: One of my favorites places during this trip, 1 month from South to North
travels.cambodia.title: Cambodia
travels.cambodia.text: One month from East to South then North, a flat but lovely country
travels.vietnam.title: Vietnam
travels.vietnam.text: 3 months to enjoy this awesome country, a backpack, a motor bike and it's a dream come true
travels.nepal.title: Nepal
travels.nepal.text: Country in between of India and China, lots of mountains and hiking
travels.india.title: India
travels.india.text: First country of this one year trip, a cultural shock
videogame.title: Video Games
videogame.text: A quick view of my video games projects
videogame.subtext: The goal of this projects is to experiment with Unreal engine and video games creation
videogame.game1.title: Game 1
videogame.game1.text: A third person action game playable from 1 to 4 in split screen with configurable difficulty, the goal is to survive
videogame.game2.title: Game 2
videogame.game2.text: A first person shooter with simple IA and very basic map, the goal is to reach a point in the map without dying
videogame.game3.title: Game 3
videogame.game3.text: A third person shooter with simple IA and simple map
sideproject.title: Side Project
sideproject.desc: Work in progress on several side projects
sideproject.text: A quick view of my side projects
sideproject.website.title: Website
sideproject.website.text: This Website is in constant evolution, from VueJs2 in 2018 then Angular in 2019 and now VueJs3
sideproject.vps.title: Personnal VPS
sideproject.vps.text: Hosting my Website and some others projects on a VPS provided by OVH, keeps me in touch with systems administration
